subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Nebraska Athletic Director Tom Osborne says he is giving Coach Bo Pelini a new five-year contract to ward off teams that may want to hire him away from the Cornhuskers.
snippet: Nebraska Athletic Director Tom Osborne says he is giving Coach Bo Pelini a new five-year contract to ward off teams that may want to hire him away from the Cornhuskers.
